attributes.action: Fair Car Insurance Premiums for Young Drivers in N. Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to motivate the government to move quickly to review the current system, where young drivers, especially boys, are being quoted exorbitant rates, as high as £20,000 to insure a car.

This blatant discrimination against young drivers must stop and fair premiums for all should be the way forward.

With a handful of companies prepared to do business with young drivers  in N.Ireland the market is not exactly competitive. An urgent and fast-acting legislative decision is needed.
